text:
EVERY SINGLE DAY when I get up, I check an assortment of Central PA pharmacies, clinics to see if there’s #COVID19 #vaccine avail for my father. 

I email a few, sign up for updates.

My phone browser looks like this ⬇️ 

So far, NOT A SINGLE APPOINTMENT OPEN-beyond frustrating. https://t.co/v4PyAqxsn9
